page.title: 10The Eisteddfod (in English).
page.content: We always have an eisteddfod at Llangeitho school on{March 1st}which is {St. David's}Day.We have two teams,Gwynfil and{Ceitho}and we elect a boy and a girl to captain each team.On that day we come to school in Welsh costume. We invite someone to be adjudicator. We practise very hard.There are competitions for singing,playing musical instruments,recitation and also for written work and art.The two teams sit on opposite sides of the hall.We are excited.Some of us are nervous when we perform but we do our best as we are anxious to score points for our team.The{stories,handwriting {and paintings}are displayed in the school.Our parents are invited to see them and also to a{concert}to hear the prizewinners.
